Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Ar-AMP (ArAMP, A. retroflexus antimicrobial peptide, natural AMPs; hevein-like family; UCSS1a; 3S=S; plants)

Literature Information.Literature: It potentially contains three pairs of disulfide bonds.It effectively inhibited the growth of different fungi tested: Fusarium culmorium (Smith) Sacc., Helminthosporium sativum Pammel., King et Bakke, Alternaria consortiale Fr., and Botrytis cinerea Pers., caused morphological changes in Rhizoctonia solani KÃ¼hn at micromolar concentrations and protected barley seedlings from H. sativum infection.
Literature Information.Author: Lipkin A, Anisimova V, Nikonorova A, Babakov A, Krause E, Bienert M, Grishin E, Egorov T.2005
Literature Information.Title: An antimicrobial peptide Ar-AMP from amaranth (Amaranthus retroflexus L.) seeds.
